Title: Isobe Isobee Monogatari Jump Festa Special
Description: ['The DVD contains the Jump Festa 2015 ', Isobe Isobee Monogatari, ' event anime. The release includes the episodes "Gintama-hen," "Shokugeki no Souma-hen," and "Haikyuu!!-hen," which parody other Jump properties.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN)']
